page.title: 08RECREATION IN PENWORTHAM
page.content: Penwortham Leisure Centre on Crowhills road has the following facilities: Tennis courts, Squash courts, Gymnasium, Sports Hall and floodlit all-weather pitches. The leisure centre offers a wide range of activities which range from judo and karate to snooker and aerobics. These activities are low priced to attract people. In a survey we asked people what sports they did outside schooland what sports they watched. 80% of them take part in sports, the most popular being football and cricket. In another survey we found that people at: 6-11 years spend their leisure time on the Tom Finney park in Penwortham. 13-19 years spend their time at Snootys disco in Preston. Adults 20 yrs onwards very in their leisure activities but all attend the centre.
